portfolio.title: Engineering Case Studies
portfolio.subtitle: A showcase of high-performance architecture and digital transformation across diverse industries.

projects.title: Custom E-commerce Platform with High Flexibility and Local Integrations
projects.description: Development of a custom e-commerce platform tailored to the local market, giving the client full control over sales, management, and integrations.
projects.problem: The client relied on ready-made solutions that limited scalability, lacked dashboard flexibility, and made it difficult to integrate local delivery and payment services.
projects.solution: We built a custom e-commerce platform using Node.js and React with MongoDB, featuring a flexible admin dashboard, secure JWT authentication, and seamless integration with local payment and delivery services.
projects.result: A stable, scalable platform with improved user and admin experience, enabling confident expansion into new markets.

projects.title: Arabic WooCommerce Store with SEO and Performance Optimization
projects.description: Building a professional Arabic e-commerce store focused on speed, easy management, and search engine visibility.
projects.problem: The client needed an Arabic store, but available solutions were slow and weak in performance and SEO.
projects.solution: We developed a fully RTL-supported WooCommerce store, optimized performance, and implemented on-page SEO best practices.
projects.result: A fast, easy-to-manage store with improved search visibility and higher engagement and sales.

projects.title: High-Converting Landing Page for a Canadian Painting Company
projects.description: A landing page designed to attract customers and maximize conversions with high performance and SEO.
projects.problem: Low conversion rates, slow page speed, and no clear booking flow.
projects.solution: We created a lightweight, fast WordPress landing page optimized for Core Web Vitals with a clear contact and booking system.
projects.result: Significant performance improvement, increased leads, and stronger local search presence.

projects.title: Professional Landing Page to Increase Painting Service Requests
projects.description: A service-focused landing page designed to boost conversions and simplify communication.
projects.problem: Generic pages that failed to clearly present services or encourage contact.
projects.solution: A custom landing page with clear sections, fast loading, and effective contact forms.
projects.result: Increased inquiries and improved customer trust.

projects.title: Comprehensive Dental Clinic Management System
projects.description: A digital system to efficiently manage all dental clinic operations.
projects.problem: Administrative chaos and difficulty tracking appointments, payments, and expenses.
projects.solution: A Laravel and React-based system with role-based access, financial reports, and a clear dashboard.
projects.result: Fully organized operations, fewer errors, and better financial control.

projects.title: Landing Page for Home and Construction Services
projects.description: A clear service landing page showcasing all home services in one place.
projects.problem: Unclear service presentation and weak communication with potential customers.
projects.solution: A fast HTML/CSS landing page with clear service sections and a direct contact form.
projects.result: More inquiries and improved service visibility.

projects.title: Volunteer Management and Evaluation System
projects.description: A platform to organize volunteer work and performance evaluation.
projects.problem: Lack of a unified system to track volunteer activity and evaluations.
projects.solution: A Laravel and React system enabling mutual evaluations, activity tracking, and role management.

projects.title: Volunteer Medical Clinic Management System
projects.description: A volunteer medical platform connecting patients, doctors, and donors.
projects.problem: Difficulty managing medical requests and verifying doctors.
projects.solution: A Laravel and React system with full admin verification and strict permissions.
projects.result: Secure and well-organized volunteer medical services.

projects.title: Scalable Multilingual E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform targeting multiple markets.
projects.problem: Need for a secure, multilingual store without future rebuilds.
projects.solution: Next.js and NestJS architecture with OAuth2 and scalable design.

projects.title: Telegram Bot for Automated Product Fetching and Posting
projects.description: A smart bot to automatically fetch and publish products.
projects.problem: Time wasted on manual posting and inconsistent scheduling.
projects.solution: A Node.js bot that scrapes data, stores it, and schedules posting automatically.
projects.result: Full automation and significant time savings.
